name: ArpeggioLinux
short_description: Arpeggio Linux, is an Open Suse based OS, which is shipped with software are drivers not included with Open Suse by Default. Arpeggio Linux Supports DVD Playback, MP3/MP4 Playback, and instead of shipping with the Firefox Browser, we ship with Google Chrome, however you are of course free to use whatever browser you desire! - Many extra repositories are already added, and we have included software such as LibreOffice, Blender, Inkscape, Pidgin and Hex Chat, all software that can run on OpenSuse 13.1 is compatible with Arpeggio Linux. (Please note that we are still in early development and frequent minor versions will be pushed out as changes are made) - This is intended mainly for Testers who wish to check out Arpeggio and submit feedback.
summary: Arpeggio Linux - Opensuse For All Out of the Box
